# From Indonesia, With Love - React Web Application

A React web application built with Vite featuring a beautiful welcome page with the title "From Indonesia, With Love".

## Project Setup Status

### Completed Steps

- [x] Created `copilot-instructions.md` in `.github` directory
- [x] Clarified Project Requirements - React web app with Vite
- [x] Scaffolded the Project - Vite + React template setup
- [x] Customized the Project - Added title and styling
- [x] Installed Dependencies - npm packages configured
- [x] Verified Build - Production build successful
- [x] Created and Configured Tasks
- [x] Updated Documentation - README and instructions

## Quick Start

1. **Install Dependencies** (if needed):
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

2. **Start Development Server**:
   ```bash
   npm run dev
   ```
   Server runs at: http://localhost:5173/

3. **Build for Production**:
   ```bash
   npm run build
   ```

## Key Files

- `src/App.jsx` - Main application component with "From Indonesia, With Love" title
- `src/App.css` - Custom styling with gradient background and animations
- `index.html` - HTML entry point
- `vite.config.js` - Vite configuration
- `package.json` - Project dependencies and scripts

## Project Features

- Fast development with Vite HMR (Hot Module Replacement)
- React 18 for modern component development
- CSS3 animations and transitions
- Clean project structure
- Production-ready build setup

## Notes

- Node.js 18+ required
- All dependencies are in `node_modules/`
- Build artifacts are generated in the `dist/` directory
- ESLint is configured for code quality
